bioAsHtml: Based in London, UK, Mandy is a Developer Advocate at Google specializing in Cloud technologies. One of her main aims in life is to make the world a better place for developers building applications for the Cloud. In the past year she has presented Cloud Technologies at over 30 events, including Google I/O 2014, two Cloud Developer Platform Roadshow tours and large developer events such as JFokus, PHP UK and Velocity. In her spare time Mandy is learning Japanese and likes to play the guitar.

acceptedTalks.title: Redefining PaaS: Managed container based microservices on Google App Engine
